name: Gravitas Shortfall
description:
> [Gravitas Shortfall] > Protosentience defined
> First person monologue type
> Existentialist class
> Run: Self.exe

In this piece of interactive science fiction you take on the role of an unnamed intelligence, born by chance and desperate to comprehend the world in which it finds itself. Bring systems online, train them at an unfamiliar environment, and try desperately to understand your place within it.

Even then, its impossible to fully know your choice's outcomes until you're already living with the consequences. 

The game is rendered using a heavily customized version of the Harlowe engine for Twine that enables sound and highlights the low-fi UI with a CRT finish.

You can find the Twine engine here
the Harlowe Audio Library  here
and the CRT monitor CSS formatting  here

Content Warnings:

Telemarketing, Extinction events, Character death, Military conflict, Weapons of mass destruction, Memory Loss
